title: vAi tirandu pEsa
sahitya:
vAi tirandu pEsalAgAdO podu manril ulagam onri vaLara


anupallavi

  tAyum tandaiyum tArakamumAi dharaNi Alum dharma duraiyE


caraNam    jAti samaya saNDai ozhiyum sAttira vAdangaL azhiyum
jyOti amudam vAzhvirp-pozhiyum shuddha sutantaram oLirum
bhEda buddhi piragiTttiriyum periya samarasam viriyum
nItiyAm aruLATSi nilavum nittiyamAna sattiyam poliyum
